patterns: Where are the nearest parking areas?
responses: You can find available parking spots at the following locations: Central Park, Downtown Lot, and Main Street Garage.
Currently, there are parking spaces available near the library and the shopping mall.
Nearby parking areas include the City Park and the Riverfront Parking.

patterns: Tell me about the parking timings
responses: Parking is available 24/7 in most areas, but be sure to check local signs for specific hours.
Most parking spots allow overnight parking, but some may have restrictions. Always check the signs.
Typical parking hours are from 8 AM to 8 PM, but some lots may differ.
Make sure to verify the timings at your specific parking location.

patterns: Tell me about the parking charges
Are there any fees for parking?
What is the price for parking?
responses: Parking fees vary by location: Central Park charges $5 for the first hour and $2 for each additional hour.
Most parking lots charge $10 for a full day, while street parking might be cheaper.
You can find detailed parking fee information on our website or at the specific parking area.
The cost of parking typically ranges from $2 to $10, depending on the location.

patterns: How can I contact Parking Buddy?
How to get in touch with support?
responses: You can contact Parking Buddy via phone at +977-1-5540555 or email at support@parkingbuddy.com.
For inquiries, please call us at +977-1-5540555 or email support@parkingbuddy.com.
Feel free to reach out at +977-1-5540555 or support@parkingbuddy.com for assistance.
Visit our official website at www.parkingbuddy.com for more contact details.
